description: Try our easy to follow Avocado With Roasted Cherry Tomatoes & A Paprika Dressing recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Vegetable dishes,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Vegetarian,Tree nut free,Avocado,Sesame free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Avocado With Roasted Cherry Tomatoes & A Paprika Dressing Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 handful fresh thyme sprigs, leaves picked
3 tbs white wine vinegar or cider vinegar

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 200°C. Sit the cherry tomatoes in a roasting tin, and toss with the olive oil. Sprinkle over the thyme, and season with salt and black pepper. Roast in the oven for 12-15 minutes until the tomatoes begin to burst and char very slightly.
Whisk together the dressing ingredients, and season well with salt and black pepper.
Halve the avocados. Carefully remove the stones, then peel away the skin. Slice each of the avocado halves lengthways without cutting all the way through, then fan the avocado.
To serve, put an avocado fan on each of 4 serving plates with the rocket and roasted tomatoes, and spoon over the dressing. Serve immediately.
